00177 class RemoveDisturbanceReplyPacket : public ReplyPacket
00178 { 
00179    public:
00187    RemoveDisturbanceReplyPacket(const RequestPacket* p,
00188                                 uint32 status);
00197    RemoveDisturbanceReplyPacket(const RequestPacket* p,
00198                                 uint32 status,
00199                                 const DisturbanceBBox* boxes, int boxcount);
00200 
00204    virtual ~RemoveDisturbanceReplyPacket();   
00206 private:
00215    template<typename FwIt>
00216    void addBoxes(FwIt first, FwIt last)
00217    {
00218       int pos = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE;
00219       // Save the length
00220       SaveLengthHelper slh( this, pos );
00221       slh.writeDummyLength( pos );
00222 
00223       typename iterator_traits<FwIt>::difference_type count = 
00224          std::distance( first, last );
00225       incWriteLong(pos, count);
00226 
00227       // Write the data
00228       for(FwIt it = first; it != last; ++it){
00229          it->save(this, pos);
00230       }
00231       
00232       slh.updateLengthUsingEndPos( pos );
00233       setLength(pos);
00234    }
00235 
00236 public:
00241    int count() const;
00242 
00247    template<typename OutIt>
00248    void readBoxes(OutIt dest) const
00249    {
00250       int pos = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE;
00251       LoadLengthHelper llh( this, pos, "[RemoveDisturbanceReplyPacket]" );
00252       llh.loadLength( pos );      
00253       
00254       // Read the data
00255       const int count = incReadLong( pos );
00256       for(int i = 0; i < count; ++i){
00257          DisturbanceBBox bbox;
00258          bbox.load(this, pos);
00259          *dest++ = bbox;
00260       }
00261       llh.skipUnknown( pos );   
00262    }
00263 
00264 };
